subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: “Hockey’s Forgotten Promise,” at the Brooklyn Historical Society, tells of the borough’s earlier brush with the N.H.L. as the Islanders begin their first season at Barclays Center.
snippet: “Hockey’s Forgotten Promise,” at the Brooklyn Historical Society, tells of the borough’s earlier brush with the N.H.L. as the Islanders begin their first season at Barclays Center.
